versos: (walk) 1 John 1:7: "But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship with one another, and the blood of Jesus, his Son, purifies us from all sin.";;;
(hebron) Joshua 14:15 - hebron used to be called Kiriath Arba after Arba
(arioch) Daniel 2:14 - Then Daniel replied with discretion and discernment to arioch
(bela) Numbers 26:40 - The descendants of bela by clan were: through Ard and Naaman, the Ardite clan; through Naaman, the Naamite clan.;;;
(salt) Colossians 4:6 - "Let your speech always be gracious, seasoned with salt, so that you may know how you ought to answer each person.";;;

(served) "But Martha was distracted by all the preparations that had to be made. She came to him and asked, 'Lord, dont you care that my sister has left me to do the work by myself Tell her to help me'" - Luke 10:40;;;
(rebelled) Isaiah 1:2 - "Listen, O heavens, and hear, O earth; For the Lord speaks, 'Sons I have reared and brought up, But they have rebelled against Me.'";;;

(smote) Exodus 12:29 - And it came to pass, that at midnight the Lord smote all the firstborn in the land of Egypt, from the firstborn of Pharaoh that sat on his throne unto the firstborn of the captive that was in the dungeon; and all the firstborn of cattle.;;;

(seir) Genesis 33:14 - "Let my lord go on ahead of his servant, while I move along slowly at the pace of the flocks and herds before me and the pace of the children, until I come to my lord in seir.";;;
(paran) Genesis 21:21 - "While Hagar and Ishmael were living in the Desert of paran, Ishmael got a wife for himself from Egypt.";;;

(amorites) Deuteronomy 7:1 - "When the Lord your God brings you into the land you are entering to possess and drives out before you many nationsthe Hittites, Girgashites, amorites, Canaanites, Perizzites, Hivites and Jebusites, seven nations larger and stronger than you";;;
(council) Psalm 89:7 - "In the council of the holy ones God is greatly feared; he is more awesome than all who surround him.";;;
(fled) Genesis 39:12 - She caught him by his garment
(deborah) Judges 4:4 - "Now deborah, a prophet, the wife of Lappidoth, was leading Israel at that time.";;;
(thereon) Genesis 2:6 - But there went up a mist from the earth
(goods) Proverbs 31:13 - "She seeks wool and flax, and works with willing hands.";;;
